application.name: catlab
application.brief: Outputs the label from a cube
application.description: This program will output the labels from an Isis cube or its detached label file. If it is run in gui mode, the label will be written to the gui log screen. Otherwise, it will be written to the terminal window. Note: This program is designed to output Isis cube labels. However, it will work on many files with pds like labels.

history.change: Modified to output label to gui if it is in interactive mode
Added more filters for FROM and TO. Updated documentation.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: This is the input cube file from which the labels will be extracted.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The text file to which the result Pvl will be written.

parameter.name: APPEND
parameter.description: This option allows output to be appened to an already existing file. If this option is not checked and the file exists, it will be overwritten.
